remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來彙總從單一位置中的網頁上的所有驗證錯誤訊息。The class is used to summarize the error messages from all validators on a Web page in a single location. 您可以藉由指派彙整從網頁上的驗證程式群組的錯誤訊息藉由設定的驗證群組控制項屬性。You can summarize the error messages from a group of validators on a Web page by assigning the control to a validation group by setting the property. 可以顯示摘要，清單中，項目符號清單中，或一個段落，根據屬性。The summary can be displayed as a list, as a bulleted list, or as a single paragraph, based on the property. 摘要可以顯示在網頁上，並在訊息方塊中藉由設定和屬性，分別。The summary can be displayed on the Web page and in a message box by setting the and properties, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用內控制控制，請確定驗證程式控制項以及與其相關聯的控制項是在相同的面板。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 如需有關使用控制局部網頁更新，請參閱[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用摘要說明在網頁上的所有驗證控制項中的錯誤訊息，而且它們顯示在項目符號清單中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to summarize the error messages from all validation controls on a Web page and display them in a bulleted list. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以獨立於其他的驗證群組頁面上進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的控制項將摘要說明的錯誤訊息。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control will summarize error messages. 當您指定的值彙總屬性，是指定群組的成員驗證控制項中的唯一錯誤訊息。When you specify a value for the property, only error messages from the validation controls that are part of the specified group are summarized. 如果您未設定此屬性的值，將摘要說明從驗證群組未指派的驗證控制項在頁面上的所有錯誤訊息。If you do not set a value for this property, all error messages from validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are summarized. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
